title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Med blue, drk teal, olive warp. Royal blue, drk teal, drk green weft.
Left selvedge. Staples inside mat folder with Larsen  descriptive label & stamped with KneedlerLauchere address. Tag with \"#3\" attached to sample. (blue, teal, olive)
